# client

**Instance Property**

The client object for the candidate list item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var client: (any NSView & NSTextInputClient)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This object must be a subclass of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView] and adopt the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextInputClient] protocol.

The candidate list item uses this property to show completion candidates as users enter text. You can disable this behavior with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCandidateListTouchBarItem/allowsTextInputContextCandidates] property.

## Providing a client and a delegate

- **delegate**: The delegate of the candidate list item.
- **NSCandidateListTouchBarItemDelegate**: A set of methods that a candidate list item delegate uses to enable selection state and list visibility.
